org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.tm

Class HibernateTransactionManagerLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.tm.HibernateTransactionManagerLookup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.infinispan.transaction.lookup.TransactionManagerLookup

    public class HibernateTransactionManagerLookup
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.infinispan.transaction.lookup.TransactionManagerLookup
    Hibernate transaction manager lookup class for Infinispan, so that Hibernate's transaction manager can be hooked onto Infinispan.
    Since:
    3.5
